ValidationRule.description: If Type value is Service Fee Exemption, then Anticipated Annual Revenue Loss is required in ReadyTalk records
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ispickval( Type__c , 'Service Fee Exemption'), isblank( Anticipated_Annual_Revenue_Loss__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ReadyTalk Exemption Request')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Anticipated Annual Revenue Loss is required.
